thread.title: Just 17 Totally Mindblowing Facts, As Read By Jaden Smith
thread.title_full: Just 17 Totally Mindblowing Facts, As Read By Jaden Smith

author: Ellie Bate
title: Just 17 Totally Mindblowing Facts, As Read By Jaden Smith
text:
View this image ›
Twitter: @officialjaden #makesuthink
ID: 10625600 2. He Is, To Put It Simply, A Philosopher. View this image ›
Twitter: @officialjaden ID: 10625625 3. Which is why this Vanity Fair video , of Jaden reading and reacting to mindblowing facts about the universe, is so genius. Please enjoy: Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=dIcgyj1F9ms . youtube.com ID: 10625650 4. “The human brain takes in 11 million bits of information every second, but is aware only of 40.” View this image ›
Vanity Fair ID: 10625666 5. “In an average lifetime, human skin completely replaces itself 900 times.” View this image ›
Vanity Fair ID: 10625674 6. “You see your nose all the time. Your brain just chooses to ignore it.” View this image ›
Vanity Fair ID: 10625681 7. “There are more synapses – nerve connections – in your brain than there are stars in the galaxy.” View this image ›
Vanity Fair ID: 10625699 8. “You were once the youngest person in existence.” View this image ›
Vanity Fair ID: 10625711 9. “On Saturn and Jupiter, it rains diamonds.” View this image ›
Vanity Fair ID: 10625813 10. “Human saliva contains a painkiller called opiorphin that is six times more powerful than morphine.” View this image ›
Vanity Fair ID: 10625723 11. “Sharks have been around for longer than trees.” View this image ›
Vanity Fair ID: 10625726 12. “50% of human DNA is shared with a banana.” View this image ›
Vanity Fair ID: 10625827 13. “There are more ways to shuffle a deck of cards than there are atoms on Earth.” View this image ›
Vanity Fair ID: 10625741 14. “If you drilled a hole through the centre of the Earth and jumped in it, it would take 42 minutes to reach the other side.” View this image ›
Vanity Fair ID: 10625749 15. “There’s a jellyfish that is immortal.” View this image ›
Vanity Fair ID: 10625755 16. “If you add up the amount of hours that World of Warcraft players have played the game, it comes out to over 6 million years.” View this image ›
Vanity Fair ID: 10625764 17. “One teaspoon of honey is the lifetime work of 12 bees.” View this image ›
Vanity Fair ID: 10625772 18. “When the oldest person was born, they had an entirely different set of people on the Earth with them. No one was the same.” View this image ›
Vanity Fair ID: 10625779 19. “Strawberries aren’t berries, but bananas are, and so are watermelons and avocados.” View this image ›
Vanity Fair ID: 10625786 20. “For every human on Earth, there are roughly 1.6 million ants.” View this image ›
Vanity Fair ID: 10625787 21. You’re welcome. ID: 10625828
 More News About Jaden Smith Ellie Bate is a celebrity reporter at BuzzFeed UK and is based in London.
